summary: Why yes, I was an avid music fan during the peak of Rule Britannia.  I had1 the mandatory copies of Different Class, I Should Coco, and The Great Escape.  I was there for Jarvis' arse-waggle at a pompous Michael Jackson, there for "the Battle of Britpop"2, there for the hidden booklet in Kid A that tore into Mister Tony Blair...
